Denn ich drip drip drip drop. Hol' besser einen Wischmop

```{r}
confidence_interval <- function(x) {
  m <- mean(x)
  s <- sd(x)
  n <- length(x)

  half_width <- 1.96 * s / sqrt(n)

  c(m - half_width, m + half_width)
}


x <- rnorm(100)
y <- rnorm(100)
z <- rnorm(100)
v <- z^2

confidence_interval(y)
confidence_interval(z)
confidence_interval(v)
```
